Method.name: GetRefChildren
Method.Implementation:
set class = $classname() &sql( DECLARE C1 CURSOR FOR SELECT Id INTO :Id FROM %Dictionary.ClassDefinition WHERE Super [ :class )
&sql(OPEN C1) &sql(FETCH C1)
#dim list As %Array = [] while (SQLCODE = 0) { do list.$push(Id) &sql(FETCH C1) } &sql(CLOSE C1) return list
